name: T'Rex and Kinect
body:
### General Description

This project is part of a bachelors dissertation.

The goal was to demonstrate the new capabilities of the Kinect v2 Sensor in combination with a robot. As an outcome the robot was controllable through gestures.

[More information coming soon..]


![(robot picture)](https://m4k2k.github.io/rex_kinect/images/trx_knc.jpg)
